pullrequest.title: Each callback with return value [Erase Entity Part 1]

content.raw:
This looks good.  Do you know what causes the `ASSERT_` to be an issue?  Is it that the function is not returning a `bool` the way it is supposed to?

Do we anticipate any other return values in the future?  In that case, it may make sense to return an `enum` rather than a `bool`, but I can’t think of any other return codes off hand.
content.html:
This looks good. Do you know what causes the ASSERT_ to be an issue? Is it that the function is not returning a bool the way it is supposed to?

Do we anticipate any other return values in the future? In that case, it may make sense to return an enum rather than a bool, but I can’t think of any other return codes off hand.
